Manage your remote team or become a better manager.

One-click Screenshots | Wherever you are on web we are there with you. We know it can be a hassle to collect evidence of behaviours when they have, so we made it easier using our extension.
See trends over time | Our intelligent app will show you trends once you have collected some entries about your team. Trends on each individual and trends across the whole team.
Easily manage a bigger team | With "Skip Report" visibility coming soon in the app you will be able to easily keep track at-a-glance how your larger team is going. We can scale easily with you and your team.

Collect screenshots as evidence of high or low performance of your team and gain access to insights at https://careerly.app.

Download now to get started for free.
